Condition.Comments: If flamethrowers are in room 29 after pulling the lever, move them so Lara has a chance to fight them.
Similary in the cage room, rotate enemy 108 so there is a bit of time to escape after triggering him.
If Marco has been added, make a new room for him and move him to it.

OnTrue.Comments: Make a room suitable for Marco.
Remove a face for the portals.
Add heavy triggers so the dragon will end the level.
Remove the normal end level trigger.

Condition.Comments: #325 If enemy 52 can't fly, move him to a platform to avoid dropping to the level floor.
